description: Try our easy to follow Prawn & Mango Kebabs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Prawn dishes,Pescatarian,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Prawn & Mango Kebabs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 16 large raw tiger prawns, peeled and deveined
1 large mango, peeled, stoned and cut into 16 bite-sized pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Put the prawns into a large bowl and add the oil, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, chilli powder, honey and salt. Mix well and marinate for about 10 minutes.
Remove the prawns from the marinade and thread 2 prawns alternately between 2 pieces of mango on each of 8 presoaked wooden skewers.

Place the skewers under a preheated hot grill, brush with the remaining marinade and grill for 2 minutes on each side or until the prawns turn pink and are cooked through. Serve 2 skewers per person with some dressed mixed leaf salad, if liked.
